name: AWS Transform: Advisor for .Net Applications
description: This dashboard recommends the waves of legacy C# applications to migrate to .Net Core. Recommendations are based on various insights such as the technology (C#), the .Net version, application size in LOC, number of 3rd party OSS dependencies, the presence of Web UI projects (like Razor views or WebForms ASPX files).

segments.name: Wave 1 - Ideal Candidates
segments.description: Meet all pre-requisites of AWS Transform: C#, .Net framework from 3.5 to 4.8, no Web UI, less than 2M LOC, few 3rd party OSS dependencies.

matchingRules.description: Legacy C# Applications with no Asp.NET in .Net Framework from 3.5 to 4.8, with less than 2M LOC and with less than 50 dependencies to 3rd party OSS components.     (100pts)
matchingRules.formula: technologies =in= (CSHARP) and technologies =out= (ASPDOTNET) and SCA:count <= 50 and LOC <= 2000000 and (Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v3.5:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.0:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.5:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.6:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.7:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.8:match == true)

segments.name: Wave 2 - Good Candidates
segments.description: Meet most of pre-requisites of AWS Transform (except the absence of Web UI components): C#, .Net framework from 3.5 to 4.8, less than 2M LOC, few 3rd party OSS dependencies..

matchingRules.description: Legacy C# applications in .Net Framework from 3.5 to 4.8 with less than 2M LOC and with less than 50 dependencies to 3rd party OSS components.     (75pts)
matchingRules.formula: technologies =in= (CSHARP) and SCA:count <= 50 and LOC <= 2000000 and (Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v3.5:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.0:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.5:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.6:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.7:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.8:match == true)

segments.name: Wave 3 - Fair candidates on upgradable .Net Core version
segments.description: C# applications in an Upgradable .Net Core version (up to .NET 7).

matchingRules.description: Legacy C# Applications in .Net Core, .Net Unified (up to 7.0) or in Net Standard with less than 2M LOC and with less than 50 dependencies to 3rd party OSS components.     (50pts)
matchingRules.formula: technologies =in= (CSHARP) and LOC <= 2000000 and (Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Core 1.0:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Core 1.1:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Core 2.0:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Core 2.1:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Core 2.2:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Core 3.0:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Core 3.1:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 1.0:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 1.1:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 1.2:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 1.3:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 1.4:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 1.5:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 1.6:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 2.0:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Standard 2.1:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.NET 5:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.NET 6:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.NET 7:match == true)

segments.name: Wave 4 - Complex Candidates Requiring Additional Efforts
segments.description: Legacy C# applications with more than 50 dependencies..

matchingRules.description: Legacy C# Applications in .Net Framework from 3.5 to 4.8 with less than 2M LOC and with more than 50 dependencies.     (75pts)
matchingRules.formula: technologies =in= (CSHARP) and SCA:count > 50 and LOC <= 2000000 and (Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v3.5:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.0:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.5:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.6:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.7:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v4.8:match == true)

segments.name: Wave 5 - Not Yet Supported
segments.description: Extra Large or very old C# applications.

matchingRules.description: C# applications in .Net Framework 1.0 to 3.0 or C# applications with more 2M LOC or .Net Core C# applications with more than 50 dependencies     (100pts)
matchingRules.formula: technologies =in= (CSHARP) and ((Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v1.0:match == true and Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v1.1:match == true and Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v2.0:match == true and Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.Net Framework v3.0:match == true) or LOC > 2000000)

segments.name: Not C# applications or no upgrade required
segments.description: Not C# applications or C# applications in latest .Net versions.

matchingRules.description: Applications not developed in C# or C# applications in NET 8 or NET 9.    (25pts)
matchingRules.formula: technologies =out= (CSHARP) or (technologies =in= (CSHARP) and (Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.NET 8:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:.NET 9:match == true or Keyword:.Net Version Checks:match == false))
